content: Presidential election in Singapore Indirect presidential elections were held in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore) on 29 December 1978. A total of 59 members of Parliament were present at the election while nine members were absent. [Benjamin Sheares](/wiki/Benjamin_Sheares) was re-elected by the [Parliament of Singapore](/wiki/Parliament_of_Singapore). Sheares was sworn in for his third term as president on 30 December 1978. ## Results CandidatePartyVotes%[Benjamin Sheares](/wiki/Benjamin_Sheares)Independent59100.00Total59100.00Total votes59â€“Registered voters/turnout6886.76 This Singapore-related article is a stub. title: 1978 Singaporean presidential election
